text: The HubSpot SEO recommendations flag several of our pages for not enough content (word count should be over 300). However the pages that are being flagged are blog topic pages and author post pages - so the page content is a collection of "posts." How do I address?

My guess is that these posts are loaded in via JS? And are not on the page when the page loads? If this is the case a solution would be to populate the page with say the ten most recent/relevant blogs and then have the script append the additional posts to the same container
